title: manolodeinternet - DACTYL - 💀 SKELETON PROFILE - LEFT SIDE OF THE KEYBOARD !!!

rules.description: manolodeinternet - DACTYL - //🔵 💀SKELETON PROFILE - LEFT SIDE OF THE KEYBOARD !!!

manipulators.description: //🔵L5 ✅💀SKELETON PROFILE - Left_control(old Left_shift) to layer_05_preparing_to / APPS_mode
//🔵L5 ✅💀SKELETON PROFILE - Left_control(old Left_shift) to layer_05_preparing_to / APPS_mode
//🔵L5 ✅💀SKELETON PROFILE - APPS_MODE: Left_control(old left_shift) to begin_comment / APPS_MODE

// 👻⚠️ Because IBM Model M isn't NKRO (rollover), it doesn't recognise the 4 character group '⇧ ⌃ ⌥ ⌘' from '⎋ `~ ⇥ ⇪' keys pressed together. There's a conflict with '⇥ ⇪' pressed simultaneously.  Only recognise one of them at a time.  What a pitty!

With the right side of modifiers, there's no problem.  The 4 character group 'f12 ⌫ (slash Vertical bar) ⏎' is compatible at the same time and whatever combination of them.  And is compatible with one more key from the left side of the keyboard as well.(what we need) for making a command: modifier+character_key
//🔵L5bis ✅💀SKELETON PROFILE In APP_MODE: left_control(old left_shift) to emoji_panel / ƒn
//🔴 END of 💀SKELETON PROFILE - LEFT SIDE OF THE KEYBOARD
